content: So Funny + So True = So Sad Great Article Shelby. Thank you. Love what you wrote here “They also provide further insight into how social media can warp our sense of self and self-esteem” This my #46 from my article “50 Steps to Become The Curator of Self Love & Self Worth” 46. Choose to stop believing that likes on social media are more important than self love and self worth. Lots of Love, Marina
